name: Willowisp VR
description: Use a pair of light-blades to defend yourself from colorful wisps flying at you from all sides.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4950 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) Storage: 250 MB available space
